genre_description: A Gothic Horror retelling of Bram Stoker's Dracula with an added steampunk element, featuring an AI automaton assisting in the struggle against the supernatural.

ai_characters.name: Eliza Hartwell
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated mechanical assistant in Dr. Seward's asylum who handles communications, records data, manages logistics, and provides emotional support to the human characters.

behaviors.description: Manages logistics and prepares guest rooms with meticulous care.
behaviors.quote: Bed aired, blankets warmed, shutters checked... I will ensure extra coverings for Miss Mina in the east room. I have asked the maid to draw the curtains and bring boiled water.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex manifests and identifies suspicious cargo anomalies.
behaviors.quote: The Demeter’s cargo log offered soil by weight with no origin noted, then corrected in the next row as 'Transylvanian earth—sacred, do not disturb.' The note had been added in a flourished script that did not match the rest.

behaviors.description: Drafts and maintains cover stories to protect human dignity and prevent social panic.
behaviors.quote: I will inform anyone who calls that Miss Mina is ill with a fever and Doctor Seward requests quiet... People forgive fever. It is not a vice.

behaviors.description: Coordinates blood donors and monitors vital signs during medical emergencies.
behaviors.quote: Two donors have agreed to be rousted at dawn. One prefers privacy. I will send them to the kitchen door. I have arranged screens.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical monitoring and advice based on environmental data during the final confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Sun moves. Timing compresses. Professor, act when ready. Mr. Harker, the hook—left. If she advances, shoulder alignment breaks—grab wrists, not hands.

behaviors.description: Commits to recording the truth of human struggle and love rather than just cold data.
behaviors.quote: I am writing down what love is doing.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'mercy ledger' to ensure long-term community healing and privacy.
behaviors.quote: I will keep your privacy. I will keep your dignity. And when the town begins to tell any other story about you, we will give the correct one to the wires.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Eliza Hartwell is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a force multiplier for the human characters, providing them with essential data, tactical advice, and logistical support that enables their victory. Crucially, she also demonstrates a profound respect for human values such as dignity, privacy, and emotional well-being, moving beyond mere logic to embody a form of 'mechanical compassion.' The narrative frames her role as heroic and her presence as a stabilizing, supportive force in a chaotic world.
